This document contains look-up tables for EMA data codes. Data are pulled from the internal data. Internal data is run through a separate script

## Lookup tables

```{r include=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

devtools::load_all()
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}

for (i in seq_along(tables)) {

    print(
    kable(
      tables[[i]],
      format = "markdown"
    )
  )
  
  
}
```
